text:
Ambur Town police have arrested three persons for breaking a glass window of a Unani clinic during the bandh in Ambur on Saturday.

Police nabbed Rajesh (31), Senthil Kumar (30) and Thamizhselvan (20) of A Kaspa in Ambur following a complaint from Gineeth Mohammed, who runs a Unani clinic on Kandhaporikara Street in Ambur Town.

Bharatiya Janata Party had called for a bandh on Saturday following an attack on the party’s State council member, Sivaprakasam, on Friday morning.

The trio had damaged the glass of the clinic during the bandh at 3.30 p.m, police said. - Staff Reporter
title: Trio nabbed for damaging clinic
